body_html: as of today yes. This PR #21202 is on master but a release hasn't been cut yet. FWIW you can use pyenv to install many python versions on a system. A professional software engineer should be able to pin their dependencies and tools depending on the project.
body_text: as of today yes. This PR #21202 is on master but a release hasn't been cut yet. FWIW you can use pyenv to install many python versions on a system. A professional software engineer should be able to pin their dependencies and tools depending on the project.
body: as of today yes. This PR https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/21202 is on master but a release hasn't been cut yet. FWIW you can use [pyenv](https://github.com/pyenv/pyenv) to install many python versions on a system. A professional software engineer should be able to pin their dependencies and tools depending on the project.
